fields.content: Please use the instructions and checklists below to prepare and return required forms to UWCSEA as well as to prepare the documents required for entry to Singapore in August 2016.Instructions for form submission Please follow the steps below to complete and submit the required forms to Ms Katelyn Goh, at katelyn.goh@uwcsea.edu.sg.  1. Print all the forms.                2. You and your parents or guardian should complete and sign the forms where required.                3. Have the completed and signed forms scanned and saved as a PDF file. 4. Submit the scann    ++++
fields.title: Elso teszt
